TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EnvelopedCms extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示封装数据的 CMS/PKCS #7 结构。

span.span: Represents a CMS/PKCS#7 structure for enveloped data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加密消息语法 RFC 为具有这些内容类型的 CMS/PKCS # 7 消息指定以下 MIME 类型和文件扩展名。The Cryptographic Message Syntax RFC specifies the following MIME types and file name extensions for CMS/PKCS#7 messages with these content types. |内容类型Content type|MIME 类型MIME type|扩展名Extension| |------------------|---------------|---------------| |envelopedDataenvelopedData|application/pkcs7-mimeapplication/pkcs7-mime|.p7m.p7m| |signedDatasignedData|application/pkcs7-signatureapplication/pkcs7-signature|.p7s.p7c.p7s.p7c|

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 使用默认值初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with default values.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 类具有以下默认属性值:The class has the following default property values: |PropertyProperty|默认值Default value| |--------------|-------------------| ||内容类型:1.2.840.113549.1.7.1 (数据)Content Type: 1.2.840.113549.1.7.1 (data)
长度: 零Length: zero| ||1.2.840.113549.3.7 (RSA_DES_EDE3_CBC) 或 2.16.840.1.101.3.4.1.42 (AES-256-CBC)1.2.840.113549.3.7 (RSA_DES_EDE3_CBC) or 2.16.840.1.101.3.4.1.42 (AES-256-CBC)| 收件人的默认值为。The default for recipients is . 在 .NET Framework 上, 默认对称加密算法由生成应用程序可执行文件的 .NET Framework 版本确定。On .NET Framework, the default symmetric encryption algorithm is determined by the version of the .NET Framework that the application executable was built against. 从 .NET Framework 4.8 开始, 默认算法为 CBC 模式下的 AES-256;在以前的版本中, 默认值为 CBC 模式下的 TripleDES (DES3-EDE)。Starting with .NET Framework 4.8, the default algorithm is AES-256 in CBC mode; in prior versions, the default is TripleDES (DES3-EDE) in CBC mode. 在 .NET Core 中, 默认的对称加密算法由加载的 "System.web. encryption" 程序集的版本确定。On .NET Core, the default symmetric encryption algorithm is determined by the version of the System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs assembly that is loaded. 从4.6.0 版本的 NuGet 包开始, 默认算法为 CBC 模式下的 AES-256;在以前的版本中, 默认值为 CBC 模式下的 TripleDES (DES3-EDE)。Starting with the 4.6.0 version of the System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs NuGet package, the default algorithm is AES-256 in CBC mode; in prior versions, the default is TripleDES (DES3-EDE) in CBC mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 收件人的默认值为。The default for recipients is . 在 .NET Framework 上, 默认对称加密算法由生成应用程序可执行文件的 .NET Framework 版本确定。On .NET Framework, the default symmetric encryption algorithm is determined by the version of the .NET Framework that the application executable was built against. 从 .NET Framework 4.8 开始, 默认算法为 CBC 模式下的 AES-256;在以前的版本中, 默认值为 CBC 模式下的 TripleDES (DES3-EDE)。Starting with .NET Framework 4.8, the default algorithm is AES-256 in CBC mode; in prior versions, the default is TripleDES (DES3-EDE) in CBC mode. 在 .NET Core 中, 默认的对称加密算法由加载的 "System.web. encryption" 程序集的版本确定。On .NET Core, the default symmetric encryption algorithm is determined by the version of the System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs assembly that is loaded. 从4.6.0 版本的 NuGet 包开始, 默认算法为 CBC 模式下的 AES-256;在以前的版本中, 默认值为 CBC 模式下的 TripleDES (DES3-EDE)。Starting with the 4.6.0 version of the System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs NuGet package, the default algorithm is AES-256 in CBC mode; in prior versions, the default is TripleDES (DES3-EDE) in CBC mode.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Certificates As X509Certificate2Collection

summary.span: 获取与 CMS/PKCS#7 封装消息关联的证书的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of certificates associated with the enveloped CMS/PKCS#7 message.

value.span: 与 CMS/PKCS # 7 封装消息关联的证书的集合。

span.span: The collection of certificates associated with the enveloped CMS/PKCS#7 message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用类来加密数据, 则在调用其中一种方法的过程中, 此集合的内容将嵌入到挂起的消息中。 When the class is being used to to encrypt data, the contents of this collection are embedded into the pending message during the call to one of the methods. 加密操作后的更改无效。Changes after the encryption operation have no effect. 在对的调用期间, 此属性的值将替换为不同的集合对象, 该对象表示已解码的消息的读取的证书。The value of this property is replaced with a different collection object during a call to , which then represents the certificates that were read out of the decoded message.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContentEncryptionAlgorithm As AlgorithmIdentifier

summary.span: 获取与此消息关联的对称加密算法的标识符。

span.span: Gets the identifier of the symmetric encryption algorithm associated with this message.

value.span: 与此消息关联的对称加密算法的标识符。

span.span: The identifier of the symmetric encryption algorithm associated with this message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用类来加密数据时, 此属性的值指示要用于加密的内容的对称加密算法。 When the class is being used to to encrypt data, the value of this property indicates which symmetric encryption algorithm to use to encrypt the content of . 此属性的值在调用期间被替换, 后者表示用于对解码的消息进行加密的对称加密算法。The value of this property is replaced during a call to , which then represents the symmetric encryption algorithm which was used to encrypt the decoded message.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContentInfo As ContentInfo

summary.span: 获取 CMS/PKCS#7 封装消息的内容信息。

span.span: Gets the content information for the enveloped CMS/PKCS#7 message.

value.span: CMS/PKCS # 7 封装消息的内容信息。

span.span: The content information for the enveloped CMS/PKCS#7 message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用类来加密数据时, 此属性的值表示要加密的数据。When the class is being used to to encrypt data, the value of this property represents the data to encrypt. 调用方法后, 不会将其替换为加密内容。It is not replaced with encrypted content after a call to an method. 此属性的值在调用期间被替换, 后者表示从消息解码的加密内容。The value of this property is replaced during a call to , which then represents the encrypted content decoded from the message. 成功调用方法后, 该值将再次替换为已解密的消息内容。After a successful call to a method, the value is replaced again, with the decrypted message contents.

summary.span: 在证书存储中搜索匹配的证书和密钥，从而通过任何可用收件人对解码的 CMS/PKCS#7 封装消息的内容进行解密。

span.span: Decrypts the contents of the decoded enveloped CMS/PKCS#7 message via any available recipient by searching certificate stores for a matching certificate and key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应在或任何其他方法之前调用。 should be called before or any other method. 如果计算机无法访问, 该方法不会搜索计算机 "我的应用商店"。The method does not search the computer My store if it is inaccessible. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 访问解密密钥需要以下权限:The following permissions are required to access the decryption key: - -

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Encrypt() cil managed

summary.span: 在通过 UI 弹出窗口选择收件人证书之后，对 CMS/PKCS#7 消息的内容进行加密。

span.span: Encrypts the contents of the CMS/PKCS#7 message after selecting recipient certificates via a UI popup.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法显示一个用户界面, 您可以在其中选择要对其加密消息的收件人。This method displays a user interface in which you choose the recipients for whom to encrypt the message. 这要求当前进程在*用户交互模式下*运行, 这意味着该属性为。 `true`This requires that the current process is running in *user interactive mode*, meaning that the property is `true`. 进程通常处于用户交互模式, 除非它是服务进程或在 Web 应用程序中运行。A process is normally in user interactive mode unless it is a service process or running inside a Web application. 用户界面将仅显示其有效期内的证书, 以及密钥使用中包含的密钥译码或密钥协议。The user interface will only present certificates that are within their validity period and that have Key Encipherment or Key Agreement included in their key usage. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 要显示用户界面, 需要具备以下权限:The following permissions are required to display the user interface: -

span.span: A cryptographic operation could not be completed.

span.span: The default value is an empty collection.

value.span: 一个集合, 该集合表示已解码消息的收件人列表。

span.span: A collection that represents the recipients list for a decoded message.
The default value is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管此属性是只读的 , 但可以使用其属性对中的对象进行修改。Although this property is read-only, a modification to the objects in the can be done by using their properties. 调用方法或任何重载的 EnvelopedCms 方法时, 不会填充属性。 The property is not populated as a result of calling the method nor any of the overloaded EnvelopedCms.Encrypt methods. 在对的调用期间, 此属性的值将替换为不同的集合对象, 该对象表示已解码的消息的读取的证书。The value of this property is replaced with a different collection object during a call to , which then represents the certificates that were read out of the decoded message.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UnprotectedAttributes As CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection

summary.span: 获取与 CMS/PKCS#7 封装消息关联的未保护（未加密）属性的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of unprotected (unencrypted) attributes associated with the enveloped CMS/PKCS#7 message.

value.span: 与 CMS/PKCS # 7 封装消息相关联的未受保护 (未加密) 属性的集合。

span.span: The collection of unprotected (unencrypted) attributes associated with the enveloped CMS/PKCS#7 message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果使用类来加密数据, 则在调用其中一种方法的过程中, 此集合的内容将嵌入到挂起的消息中。 When the class is being used to to encrypt data, the contents of this collection are embedded into the pending message during the call to one of the methods. 加密操作后的更改无效。Changes after the encryption operation have no effect. 在调用期间, 此属性的值将替换为不同的集合对象, 该对象表示附加到消息但未加密的属性。The value of this property is replaced with a different collection object during a call to , which then represents the attributes which were attached to the message without being encrypted.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Version As Integer
public: property int Version { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取解码的 CMS/PKCS#7 封装消息的版本。

span.span: Gets the version of the decoded enveloped CMS/PKCS#7 message.

value.span: 已解码的 CMS/PKCS # 7 消息的版本。

span.span: The version of the decoded enveloped CMS/PKCS#7 message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值在调用期间被替换, 后者表示包含在消息中的版本号。The value of this property is replaced during a call to , which then represents the version number contained within the message.
